title: Logo for James Cropper
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141007082946im_/http:/typophile.com/files/JAMESCROPPERlogo_5781.png)

I'm trying to identify the typography in this logo.

It's close to Sackers Gothic, Engravers Gothic, Gotham, Sweet Sans Pro Medium, Trio Goretsk and Effra but isnt quite any of them. Can anyone help please?
author: RoboFont

comments.content: Looks like it is Alright Sans (Medium) from TypeTrust, maybe spread just a tiny bit.

Seems most likely to be a modified Gotham, to me. The EST. 1845 is lightly [Sweet Sans - Small Caps](http://web.archive.org/web/20141007082946/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sweet/sans/?refby=typographica)
+1 for an edited Gotham, /A, /M, /E, /S, /C and /O look spot on to me. /J could easily be reproduced starting with /U and it would left a small edition on /P and /R to perfectly match this design.
